title: Sleep Rock

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Help someone sleep at night or put them to sleep forever.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If you help someone sleep, they will be roleblocked.

> If you put them to sleep forever, you will attack them. This can only be done once.

desc:
Post 1331
*"Give someone sleep and you help them for a day. Give someone the ability to sleep forever and help them for the rest of their afterlife."*
